buginformation.summary: Add apache-hbase.slack.com #users channel to ref guide
buginformation.description: We have a user channel on Slack at http://apache-hbase.slack.com, but no reference to it in the Getting Involved section of our ref guide. We should fix that and probably note that new users who want access and don't have an apache.org email address should request an invite by emailing dev@.
